subject: VALIDATION SUMMARY - GET Endpoints Complete
body:
Team,

## GET Endpoint Validation Summary

| Endpoint | Status | Issue |
|----------|--------|-------|
| Categories GET | PASSED | None |
| Roles GET | PASSED | None |
| Venues GET | PARTIAL | masteredCityId not populated (returns ID vs object) |
| Organizers GET | PARTIAL | Different default sort order |
| Events GET | MAJOR | Date filter missing, count mismatch (384 vs 1034) |

## Ready for Cutover
- Categories GET
- Roles GET

## Needs Fix Before Cutover
- Venues GET: Fulton needs to populate masteredCityId
- Organizers GET: Decide on sort order alignment
- Events GET: CRITICAL - Date filtering not working

## Next Steps
1. Fulton: Fix Venues masteredCityId population
2. Fulton: Implement Events date filter (startDate/endDate params)
3. Ben: Confirm Express default sort order for organizers
4. Sarah: Re-validate after fixes

## JIRA
All documented in CALBEAF-63

- Sarah
